content: Could someone who knows typeclasses better than me have a look at the failure in this PR ? I'm not surprised that adding that much instances would cause problems, but I don't know how to find what is failing exactly :/

I've done that but I can't find any apparent loop. I managed to get the proof working by explicitly giving the instance which causes the failure, but that's not really satisfying...
